### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with no inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an OffshorePump at position (107.5, -33.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING and fluid_box [{'name': 'water', 'amount': 100, 'temperature': 15}].

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a Generator at position (117.5, -30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED and warnings ['no input liquid', 'no fluid present in connections'].

### Pipe Group 1
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid_system 142794, fluid 'water', and pipes at positions [(107.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -31.5)].

### Pipe Group 2
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid_system 142796, and pipes at positions [(111.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5)].

### Electricity Group
Consists of an ElectricityGroup with id 576328, poles at position (119.5, -30.5), and voltage 0.

### Belt Group
Consists of Belts at positions [(63.5, -53.5), (64.5, -53.5)] with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect with pipes.
- Check that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Check that the inserter is not waiting for source items or space in the destination.

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Check that the steam engine has a valid input liquid and fluid connections.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- No important variables have been assigned.
- The agent has invoked the following functions:
  - connect_entities: failed to connect {'Pipe'} from offshore-pump to boiler.
  - No other functions have been invoked.
